product_images.title: Clipso Translucent coverings
product_images.description:
Translucent Covering 
Polyester knitted fabric coated with polyurethane (PU)

Width
Up to 5,10 meters (no joints or seams)

Weight
200 gr/m2, +/- 10%

Color
Translucent white

Appearance
Translucent, smooth and uniform

Quality
More resistant than the PVC film, does not crack

CE Classification
See information at the bottom of the page

Environment
Free from halogens and heavy metals

Resistance to humidity
CLIPSO® is hydrophobic and is not affected by damp and chlorinated conditions

Packaging
Cut to measure or in roll (50 m)
